definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: These suitcases are too heavy to carry; we need a trolley.
sentences.chinese: 這些衣箱太沉了，我們需要一輛小手推車。

sentences.english: One day he put the hats into his barrow and went along the road to the market.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把帽子放進手推車裏，沿路去市場。

sentences.english: I watched the Barrow Prisons for over 10 thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 我守護這個手推車鐵籠子已經有1萬多年了。

sentences.english: The fruit tumbled from the overturned cart.
sentences.chinese: 水果從翻倒的手推車裏滾出來。

sentences.english: The costermonger are barrowing apples and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 小販用手推車裝運蘋果和蔬菜。

sentences.english: The cart and fruit were overthrown by a speeding car.
sentences.chinese: 手推車和水果被一輛急馳而過的汽車撞翻了。

sentences.english: He trundled a wheel barrow down the path.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推車沿路走過。

sentences.english: He peddled fish from a pushcart.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推車沿街賣魚。

sentences.english: Do you know how many things on the pushcart?
sentences.chinese: 客房打掃房間的時候推的手推車上都放有那些東西？

sentences.english: The gardener trundled a wheelbarrow along the path.
sentences.chinese: 那園丁在小徑上推著一輛獨輪手推車。

sentences.english: Handcarts and other products made from wood sell well after the war.
sentences.chinese: 手推車和其他產品從木材銷售以及在戰爭結束後。

sentences.english: Our old handcart rattled over the street.
sentences.chinese: 我們的舊手推車嘎嘎地穿過大街。

sentences.english: I pried it loose with a crowbar and hoisted it into the wheelbarrow.
sentences.chinese: 我用撬棍把它撬松，然後搬到了手推車裏。

sentences.english: His handcart is still rattling along though it was oiled yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他的手推車雖然昨天上了油，但跑起來還是嘎嘎作響。

sentences.english: Here, take one of these trolleys. What do you want exactly?
sentences.chinese: 到了，請推一輛手推車。你到底想買些什麼？

sentences.english: The narrow quay was encumbered by hundreds of carts.
sentences.chinese: 狹窄的碼頭被數百輛手推車堵得水泄不通。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to pile up like a mountain (idiom)/a mountain of (paperwork etc)/a large number of sth
to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
